metaInfo.title: Datascience
metaInfo.desc: Enroll in the System Design Event and learn from live classes. Get Knowledge by working on industry projects.

topicsCoveredMasterclass: Why AI is essential for leadership success in modern organizations.
Understand RAG, LLM’s and their applications.
Real-world Training in prompt engineering and their issues
Understand GenAI concepts: GANs, VAEs, Transformers.
eventFeatureData.speakerDesignation: Designation : data scientist and GenAI Specialist
topicsMasterclass: Managers and Leaders looking to future-proof their careers.
Senior professionals aiming to integrate AI in their decision-making processes.
Professionals interested in AI-driven productivity and efficiency.
eventFeatureData.heading4: What our Learners have to say
aboutLearnbay: We are a premier provider of specialized Data Science and AI programs, committed to empowering working professionals with the skills and technical expertise needed to excel in today’s dynamic tech-driven landscape.
eventFeatureData.aboutLearnbayHeading: Some of our standout features include:
standoutFeatures: Curriculum that is developed, supervised and approved by industry experts
1:1 mentorship from top experts in the field
Opportunities to gain technical expertise through real-world projects
Over 120 hiring partners and dedicated placement support
standoutFeaturesLastHead: Sign up for a free demo class and enroll in the domain of your choice.
